law.catch_line: Payment to racing commission relieves person of claims liability.
law.text: Any person who pays the sum represented by the unclaimed pari-mutuel tickets to the racing commission under KRS 230.363 is relieved of all liability for the value of said unclaimed pari-mutuel tickets for any claim made in respect of said unclaimed pari-mutuel tickets.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 465, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 21, effective July 13, 2004. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 307, sec. 5, effective June 17, 1978.
